column4: can someone help me? the timing with audio and video is off synch slightly in totem-xine. It's not just one file, it happens on any file I play
i know in windows, you can open a config for any codec... and change the quality
ugh, I just checked and it happens in any player I use
check the faq of the xvid driver?
if the video doesnt have that 'flag' rendered with it, on older hardware, video tends to be desynched with the audio
I'm not exactly using older hardware
maybe... is your video driver installed?
search for the xvid frontend then,if your video driver is fine
I don't know about my video driver...
It's the same on divx files too
well, you could go to each codec config, and degrade each one
